record.text:
Reich’s Burger King

Walking around Germany today, one sees few signs of the brutal years of Nazi rule. Aside from concentration camps and a handful of larger sites like Berlin's Olympic Stadium and the Nuremberg Rally Grounds preserved as memorials, Germany has scrubbed away signs of its dark past…

external.description: Walking around Germany today, one sees few signs of the brutal years of Nazi rule. Aside from concentration camps and a handful of larger sites like Berlin's Olympic Stadium and the Nuremberg Rally Grounds preserved as memorials, Germany has scrubbed away signs of its dark past and replaced them with memorials remembering countless victims. From the early 1930s until 1945, swastikas and Reichsadlers (“eagles of the Reich,” which usually held swastikas in their talons) were splashed over every German city, town, and small village in the country. Today, it is incredibly rare to find an original “in the wild.” Ironically, a surviving Reichsadler can be found in one of the homes of the National Socialist Movement, Nuremberg, and even more surprising is that the symbol is found on the side of a Burger King.
external.title: Reich’s Burger King

NEWYou can now listen to Fox News articles! A cybersecurity expert warns that a scam that has been used to drain entire life savings or retirement accounts has become "devastating" for seniors. FBI Los…

external.description: NEWYou can now listen to Fox News articles! A cybersecurity expert warns that a scam that has been used to drain entire life savings or retirement accounts has become "devastating" for seniors. FBI Los Angeles on July 15 posted a reminder on X about the Phantom Hacker Scam, which has cost Americans over $1 billion since at least 2024, according to the agency. The FBI said the scam targets senior citizens and warns that victims could lose their "life savings." The scam operates in three phases: a "tech support impostor," "financial institution impostor" and a "US government impostor."
external.title: FBI warns seniors about billion-dollar scam draining retirement funds, expert says AI driving it

external.description: Toby Sebastian offers private songwriting classes Florence Pugh’s brother Toby Sebastian is swapping the screen for the studio in a dramatic career move. The actor, who fans will remember as Trystane Martell in Game of Thrones and as Andrea Bocelli in the biopic The Music of Silence, has now turned his focus to music and he’s inviting fans to join him on the journey. This month he reached out to his mailing list to announce that he’s launching private songwriting sessions.  The former Game of Thrones actor is now advertising 90 minute private sessions for £150, or a discounted package of four lessons for £500.

record.text: Being terrible for the environment isn’t intrinsic to AI, guys, so go ahead and use it to find camps for your kids and a source or two more for your research project.

images.alt: But President Trump is waging a war against clean energy, gutting the Biden-era policies that were supporting the build-out of solar, wind and battery infrastructure. There’s something almost comically grim about powering something as futuristic as A.I. off something as archaic as coal or untreated methane gas. That, however, is a political choice we are making as a country. It’s not intrinsic to A.I. as a technology.

ソニーとFnatic監修のINZONEゲーミングギア2025年発売予約ポイント還元 - AIゲームまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description:
ソニーはeスポーツチームFnaticと共同開発したゲーミングギアブランド“INZONE”の新製品として、2025年9月5日に計6製品を発売することを発表した。  
これらの製品には、調整可能なアクチュエーションポイントとラピッドトリガーを搭載したゲーミングキーボードや、軽量かつ長時間使用可能なゲーミングマウス、低遅延のワイヤレス対応ヘッドセット、完全密閉構造のイヤホン、快適な操作性を持つマウスパッドなどが含まれる。  
ゲーミングキーボードの“INZONE KBD-H75”はコンパクトな75%テンキーレスで、価格は39,600円。  
マウスの“INZONE Mouse-A”は約48.4gの軽さと90時間持続バッテリーを特徴とし、価格は22,000円。  
ヘッドセット“INZONE H9 II”は、ソニーのハイエンドドライバーを採用し、260gと軽量で、価格は39,600円。  
イヤホン“INZONE E9”は密閉構造で遮音性に優れ、価格は17,600円（ブラックのみ）。  
マウスパッド“INZONE Mat-D”と“INZONE Mat-F”は、それぞれ滑りやすさと安定性に優れ、価格は4,950円と8,250円。  
また、これらの製品はAmazonで予約すると10％ポイント還元となるセールも実施中で、詳細は記事執筆時点の情報に限定される。

record.text:
アイ・オー・データ初有機ELゲーミモニターGigaCrysta10周年モデル登場 - AIゲームまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description:
アイ・オー・データは、ゲーミングモニターシリーズ“GigaCrysta”の10周年記念モデル第4弾として、有機EL（QD-OLED）技術を採用した27型の“LCD-GDQ271UEL”を発表しました。  
このモデルは、解像度WQHD（2560×1440）で、最大リフレッシュレート280Hz、応答速度0.03msと高いスペックを誇り、没入感のある映像体験を実現します。  
Quantum Dot技術により、DCI-P3カバー率99%を達成し、色彩表現も鮮やかです。  
また、コントラスト比は1,500,000:1と非常に高く、映像の深みと濃淡を極めて忠実に再現します。  
有機ELパネルは自発光方式で、残像感の少ない超高速応答を可能にし、FPSやレースゲームなど動きの激しいタイトルに最適です。  
焼き付き防止技術や3年間の保証も付帯し、安心して導入できる設計となっています。  
さらに、W(白)画素を使わない構造により文字のにじみも軽減され、ビジネスやクリエイティブ用途にも適しています。  
最薄部は3.9mmのスリムなデザインで、スタイリッシュな外観と机上の空間に馴染む設計です。  
2025年8月末の出荷予定で、価格はオープンながら想定売価は98,780円（税込）となっています。  
高性能な映像体験と多用途性を兼ね備えた革新的なゲーミングモニターとして、ゲーマーやクリエイターからの注目を集めています。

record.text:
登山没入体験を追求した『Cairn』Game Bakers新作をインタビュー - AIゲームまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description: 2025年8月20日から24日に開催されたヨーロッパ最大級のゲームイベント“gamescom2025”にて、フランスのゲームスタジオ“The Game Bakers”の新作『Cairn』について取材した。『Cairn』は険しい山“カミ”の登頂を目指すサバイバルクライミングゲームであり、山を観察し、岩肌を登る過程や緊張感、達成感を音楽とともに体感できる。2025年11月5日の発売を予定し、6月に配信されたデモは50万ダウンロードを突破した。インタビューにはクリエイティブディレクターのエメリック・ソア氏が登壇し、アルピニズムをテーマとした背景や、日本やフランスのマンガ・ゲームから受けた影響、リアルな山の再現に向けたリサーチや苦労について語った。特に山登りの動きやアニメーション、グラフィックには日本の文化やチャレンジ精神が反映されている。フランス人の山岳への思いと山の背景にある達成感の哲学もゲームに反映され、フリーソロモードなど過酷な挑戦も投入された。開発は最終段階に入り、バグ修正や調整を進めているとし、チームの誇りとともに完成への自信を示した。山の名前“kami”は日本語の“神”に由来し、文化的な深みと共鳴も垣間見える内容となっている。
external.title: 登山没入体験を追求した『Cairn』Game Bakers新作をインタビュー - AIゲームまとめ

record.bridgyOriginalText:
We need to talk seriously about #genAi and #Time. It *appears* that tools like ChatGPT and Copilot complete tasks *much quicker* than humans, thereby offering increased #Efficiency
But the way they do this is by breaking the tasks into millions of simpler subtasks which can run simultaneously i.e. #ParallelDistributedProcessing
If we completed those tasks serially, it would likely take longer than a human. And takes many times as much of our finite planetary resources. It's a trick, an #Illusion

record.text:
【皆様のAIチャットは、どれ？】
メイン垢で「Apple Intelligence」が使えるようになったと投稿しましたが、設定見たら『ChatGPT』を拡張機能としてセットしてChatGPTの機能も使える仕様みたいです。
なので・・・

WindowsやOffice(Word/Excel/PowerPoint等)を一番使うなら「Microsoft Copilot」

iOS(mac/iPhone/iPad)を一番使うなら「ChatGPT」

Googleのサービス(AndroidOS/Gmail/YouTube等)を一番使うなら「Google Gemini」

なのかなー？と思った。

【日本語でおｋ】
StableDiffusionで『竹刀』を出したい時、翻訳アプリで日英翻訳すると「Bamboo sword」と出てきた。
コレをそのままプロンプトに入力すると『緑の竹の棒を持つ』シーンしか出力されなくて困った。
そこで、AIチャットに「竹刀を英語で説明する時、何て言う？」という感じで聞いたら

『shinai』です

って回答が出て、へぇ～。ってなった。
実際に『holding shinai』で、竹刀を持ってくれた。構えてはくれないが。

和風の物を出力したい時は、翻訳ではなくAIチャットに聞いた方が確実かもしれない。

#AIイラスト
#AIart

New Instats livestreaming seminar: AI Powered Dimension Reduction with Copilot

#Biostatistics #Business #ComputationalSocialScience #ComputationalStatistics #ConsumerResearch #CulturalEconomics #DataAnalytics #DataScience #DevelopmentStudies #Econometrics #Economics #EnergyEconomics #Entrepren

external.description:
Join our one-day, hands-on workshop on modern dimension-reduction techniques using Microsoft Co‑Pilot — essential methods for high-quality empirical research that simplify measurement, reveal latent constructs, reduce multicollinearity, and support segmentation and preference mapping. Tailored for PhD students, academics, and professional researchers across the social and health sciences, the workshop uses real survey and secondary data in two interactive 2‑hour sessions (Session 1: group comparisons & exploratory factor analysis; Session 2: multidimensional scaling/preference mapping and cluster analysis) combining short conceptual briefings, live Co‑Pilot demonstrations, guided exercises and group troubleshooting. You will learn to run defensible factor, MDS and clustering workflows, produce publication-ready diagnostics and visualizations, generate annotated scripts and methodological reporting checklists, and integrate factor scores into segmentation for reproducible, peer-review-ready outputs — while gaining skills to strengthen supervision and teaching. Sessions are livestreamed via Zoom; recordings, materials and a monitored Q&A forum are available for 30 days after the seminar, and participants receive an Instats certificate of completion (ECTS equivalent where shown). Basic familiarity with Co‑Pilot is helpful — learn more and register via the seminar listing.

#Biostatistics #Statistics #DataScience #Ethics #Education  #Research #ResearchTraining #Instats

external.description:
Join the ASSON National Statistics Students Conference—a free, virtual event in collaboration with the American Statistical Association—bringing together statistics students and professionals across Nigeria and beyond to explore the role of statisticians in today’s digital world. The West Africa Time program features poster sessions showcasing cutting‑edge undergraduate research, an inspiring keynote by ASA President Ji‑Hyun Lee (“The Future Belongs to Statisticians”), a student roundtable on Change‑Making from Campus, awards, networking opportunities, and digital participation certificates. Whether you’re an undergraduate starting your journey, a graduate student, or a professional researcher looking to connect and mentor, this conference will equip you with tools, connections, and confidence to make an impact—register for free to join us.


#Biostatistics #Statistics #DataScience #Ethics #Education  #Research #ResearchTraining #Instats
external.title: ASSON 2025 National Statistics Student Conference - Livestream starting Oct 15, 2025 (UTC)

record.text:
New Instats livestreaming seminar: AI-Powered multiOmics Data Analysis

#Bioinformatics #ComputationalBiology #DataScience #MachineLearning #Statistics #Genomics  #Python #RStudio #TensorFlow #Research #ResearchTraining #Instats

external.description:
Join Dr Nikolay Oskolkov (PI, LIOS) for a full‑day, hands‑on workshop on turning multi‑omics data (genomics, transcriptomics, proteomics, metabolomics and single‑cell) into robust, reproducible biological insight — designed for PhD students, postdocs, faculty and research professionals in bioinformatics, computational biology, data science and machine learning. Through concise lectures, case studies and practical coding sessions in Python, RStudio and TensorFlow (with advanced LLM support), you’ll learn end‑to‑end strategies for preprocessing, batch correction, imputation, unsupervised and supervised integration, linear vs non‑linear modeling, deep learning for multimodal data, single‑cell workflows, time‑series modeling, and rigorous evaluation using independent cohorts. Participants will leave with runnable notebooks, example pipelines, model templates (including TensorFlow and Random Forests), and a clear roadmap to apply these techniques to thesis projects, grants and collaborative studies; basic familiarity with R or Python and core ML/statistics is recommended and preparatory materials will be provided. The workshop is livestreamed via Zoom, with recordings, materials and a monitored Q&A forum available for 30 days after the seminar, and attendees receive an Instats certificate of completion (ECTS equivalents noted for European students where applicable). Register now to secure your spot and accelerate your multi‑omics research.


#Bioinformatics #ComputationalBiology #DataScience #MachineLearning #Statistics #Genomics  #Python #RStudio #TensorFlow #Research #ResearchTraining #Instats
external.title: AI-Powered multiOmics Data Analysis - Livestream starting Sep 25, 2025 (UTC)

record.text: You are right. There seems to be a mix-up in the original post. There is a large LNG terminal under construction in Ust-Luga but it is not operational. The Novatek plant only processes gas condensate.

Naphtha, kerosene and jet fuel out of natural gas?? Copilot is hallucinating. You get a little propane and butane as a byproduct of LNG production and they may be used as a component in winter grade gasoline but not in the heavier products like kerosene.
Land swaps are only agreed between the parties that occupy the land. US and Russia can of course agree on land swaps between each other, and Alaska is a natural place for such discussions..

って言ってたら超能力バトルする夢見た

久しく夢を見ていない。
正確には、仕事の夢ばかり見ていてつまらない。

以前はアクションゲームみたいな夢が多かった。こう、アジトで同年代の仲間と武器を用意して作戦を練ったり、船旅をしたり、車をただただかっ飛ばしたり、焚き火をやったり……
あとは逃げる夢も多かったな。施設からの脱走、尾行してくる子どもを撒く……とか、とにかく人間に追われて、逃げる。思い出せるのは、全力ダッシュで、ハイになってて、逃げおおせるか、捕まったら目を覚ますのどちらかだったってこと。

夢からネタを取ってくることも多かったから、この状況は芳しくない。インプットが足りていない可能性もあるな。本読もう。

---

**Top post:**
From *Republicans against Trump (@RpsAgainstTrump)*
Text:
"Trump: Democrats are calling me up and they’re saying, ‘Sir, I want to thank you. My wife and I went out to dinner last night for the first time in 4 years, and D.C. is safe... The restaurants the last 2 days were busier than they’ve been in a long time"

(Attached is a CNN screenshot showing Trump speaking at the White House with the chyron: *"TRUMP HOLDS MEETING WITH ZELENSKY IN THE OVAL OFFICE."*)

Follow-up tweet from the same account:
"Hey @Grok, is Trump right? Are DC restaurants busier or emptier than usual in recent days? Short answer."

Timestamp: *10:47 PM · Aug 18, 2025 · 32.4K Views*

---

**Reply from Grok (@grok):**
"No, Trump is not right. DC restaurants are emptier than usual in recent days (Aug 11-17, 2025), with reservations down 16–31% vs. last year, per Resy data, due to federal police presence scaring off patrons—despite violent crime dropping 26% YTD."

---
